video.title: Midnight Diner
video.synopsis: A scarred man operates a midnight diner in the backstreets of Shinjuku. No one knows his name or his story, but his customers each bring him theirs.

episodes.synopsis: The stern-faced master of this diner only wields his knife from midnight to 7 am. The yakuza Ryu has been a regular since he tasted the “red wieners”.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Struggling singer Miyuki orders her favorite “nekomamma”. Master recalls another regular who is a lyricist. He later writes her a song as a gift.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Miki, Rumi and Kana meet at the diner to eat “ochazuke” (hot tea over rice) and gab about men. Master secretly calls them the “ochazuke sisters.”
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Master starts each night by making potato and macaroni salad. A recent regular and charismatic porn star has become a fan of his potato salad.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Komichi brings food critic Toyama to the diner, who kills the mood. Goro comes for his usual butter rice which turns Toyama into a weekly patron.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Boxer Kacchan always eats katsudon (pork cutlet over rice) after a win. He falls in love with another regular Akemi. A big match suddenly comes up.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Hopeful star Risa meets struggling student and newspaper delivery boy Nakajima at the diner. They share an egg sandwich together. Could this be love?
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Ex-idol Rinko visits the diner. Her former fan club members get excited when they hear she ate a plate of pan-fried noodles topped with a fried egg.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Yachiyo, an older lady, visits the diner two days in a row. She becomes friends with Marilyn the stripper and they go out clubbing together.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Gen, who usually comes with his “big bro” Ryu, is alone tonight when he orders ramen. He then stabs the leader of an opposing gang and disappears.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Yakuza and diner regular Ryu’s favorite meal is Master’s “red wieners.” One day, his high school baseball teammate-turned-detective Noguchi appears.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Saya always orders fried chicken and then dozes off at the diner. She financially supports her struggling comedian boyfriend, but he is cold to her.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Oren, drunk again tonight, eats sake-steamed clams at the diner. Her worried son carries her home. He is unable to take away her joys of drinking.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: Bento shop employee Shoji has a crush on Ikumi, who loves Master’s aspic. He is shocked when patron Komichi tells him Ikumi works in the sex trade.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: Filmmakers Genki and Yuki bring canned pineapples to Master who makes them sweet and sour pork. They meet Kikuno and ask her to star in their film.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: After novelist Suzuki leaves, hostess Hana and her customer enter the diner. Hana sheds tears as she eats her creamed stew, remembering her mother.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: Regular customer Tsukiko is a TV screenwriter. She comes again alone, revealing how she recently shared Master’s pickled cabbage with a cab driver.
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: Hitomi often supported young men only to be cast aside. She falls in love with older man Hashimoto. The two eat cold noodles at the diner on weekends.
episodes.title: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: Patron Kanemoto visits the diner with beautiful Chiaki. Seeing Master’s meat and potato dish, she recalls how her family was too poor to buy beef.
episodes.title: Episode 19

episodes.synopsis: Gyoza is the one item Master orders from Murata instead of making himself. Murata’s wife Momoko has an intimate past with diner regular Katagiri.
episodes.title: Episode 20

episodes.synopsis: Widowed singer Misao Kashima makes a rare visit to eat minced meat cutlets. Misao has been unable to perform on stage ever since she lost her husband.
episodes.title: Episode 21

episodes.synopsis: Comic editor Uno brings up-and-coming award-winning artist Hashimoto to eat Master’s pork-wrapped tomatoes. He lives with a woman and writes comics.
episodes.title: Episode 22

episodes.synopsis: Private detectives Kei and Mamoru are drawn to the aroma of Master’s simmered taro and squid. They spend the night together after leaving the diner.
episodes.title: Episode 23

episodes.synopsis: Regular Komichi falls for Kasumi, whose past is unknown. She asks Master to make pickled ginger tempura, a taste familiar to people from Osaka.
episodes.title: Episode 24

episodes.synopsis: Miho and Sayuri, in charge of their elementary school reunion, order vermicelli salad. The two recall their old schoolmate who loved the dish.
episodes.title: Episode 25

episodes.synopsis: The weather is getting cooler so Master prepares extra stuffed cabbage to the regular customers’ delight. Only the stripper Marilyn feels differently.
episodes.title: Episode 26

episodes.synopsis: On Saturday mornings, Yoshio and wife Mizue come to eat clam soup. People refer to them as a close couple. Yoshio is actually Mizue’s third husband.
episodes.title: Episode 27

episodes.synopsis: ”Do you have sautéed burdock?” asks stately Chizuru Ichikawa as she enters the diner. She is Gen’s former high school teacher, club adviser, and crush.
episodes.title: Episode 28

episodes.synopsis: Detectives Noguchi and Izumi always disagree. He wants “liver and chives”, she wants “chives and liver”. She tells Master she wants a new partner.
episodes.title: Episode 29

episodes.synopsis: It’s New Year’s Eve. The regulars all come by to ring in the new year with Master’s soba noodles. The diner is always a special place for them.
episodes.title: Episode 30
